Description.Name: Sarpedon Main Battle Tank
Description.Details: Developed by Kallon Industries, the Sarpedon is the FWL’s answer to the Cappellan Po MBT. With supplies of the Po tank suddenly dying up as the Confederation redirected the output of Ceres’s production lines towards the Clan fronts, the FWL found itself in a bind. Relying on the dependable Cappellan tank, the League suddenly found itself facing a significant shortfall in supply, with many units unable to adequately replace combat losses. Kallon Industries solution was the Sarpedon, a 50 ton MBT built around a standard 200 rated Fusion Engine and armed with a Gauss Rifle and a Medium Pulse Laser. Cheap and effective, the Sarpedon is a traditional tank designed to engage and destroy opposing armour assets and light mechs. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters.
